[[Category:Skills]][[Category:Overdrive]]
[[File:Flag_wrestling.gif|thumb]]
__TOC__
==Description==
Wrestling is a skill that uses your fists instead of weapons. It does very little damage but can be used to strike a target and interrupt their spell casting. It compliments Mages for this reason as well as mages need 2 free hands to cast spells or meditate. Timing a well placed hit will interrupt a Greater Heal or Flame Strike which can mean everything.

==Special Move==
Wrestling has two special moves: [[Stun]] and [[Disarm]]. With at least 80 Wrestling and 80 [[Anatomy]], you have a chance to [[Stun]] your opponent. With 80 Wrestling and 80 [[Arms_Lore|Arms Lore]], you have a chance to [[Disarm]] an opponent.

The chance to successfully [[Stun]] and [[Disarm]] takes into considering both your Wrestling and your [[Anatomy]] or [[Arms_Lore|Arms Lore]], respectively. To have the best chance of a successful strike, aim to get both as high as possible, ideally to 100.0 - You will of course first have to successfully hit your opponent as well!

In a scenario where you and your opponent have 100 Wrestling, you have a 50% chance to hit him with a normal punch. If you have [[Stun]] or [[Disarm]] toggled, then another calculation is used to determine your chance to hit that [[Special_Moves|Special Move]] taking into consideration Wrestling, [[Anatomy]] and a base chance of [[Stun]].

Special Moves can be accessed through your client assistance program by setting a hotkey for that skill, or through the client itself through Settings > Macros > New macro > Add:

[[File:Special_Moves_Stun_Disarm_Macro_Preview.PNG]]

==Usage==
* Simply punching a target will interrupt their spells with Wrestling.
* To stun, simply "Arm" your [[Stun]] (I advise setting this to a hotkey) and hit the target.
* Stunning a target or failing to stun a target will consume stamina. It's ideal to carry [[Potions#Types_of_Potions|Refresh Potions]] for this.
* Stunning a target will lock them in place for 3 seconds, keeping them from moving or casting.

==Recommended Leveling==
:0-50: Train from NPC
:50-100: Simply attack a target with your fists. Using this on an alternate character is ideal.

==Defensive Wrestling==
The [[Evaluate_Intelligence|Evaluate Intelligence]] and [[Anatomy]] skills work together to provide a passive [[Evaluate_Intelligence#Defensive_Ability|Defensive Wrestling]] ability. As it is passive, you do not have a chance to actively hit a player but it does provide a mitigation against incoming melee attacks. This can be used to avoid putting Wrestling on your Template.

==Overdrive Notes==
Stun punch has been disabled on [[Overdrive|Overdrive Server]].
